name: Image Generation
description: Generating images using TTI (Text-to-Image) bindings in Lollms.
content:
# LoLLMs Image Generation

Use the `diffusers` binding or other TTI (Text-to-Image) bindings to generate images.

```python
from lollms_client import LollmsClient

lc = LollmsClient()

# Note: Requires a TTI binding to be active on the server
image_data = lc.generate_image(
    prompt="A futuristic city in the style of cyberpunk",
    width=512,
    height=512
)
```
